description.author: Salesforce
text: A router component that manages the display of different views based on the application's current route. It shows a spinner while loading new views and allows for dynamic registration of view components.

elements.name: loadingSpinner
elements.description: Represents the loading spinner shown while views are being loaded.

elements.name: viewSlot
elements.description: Represents the slot where the current view's content will be displayed.
